text: Michael Roland Ratledge (6 May 1943 â€“ 5 February 2025) was a British musician. He was a founding member of Soft Machine. He was the last founding member to leave the group. Ratledge was born in Maidstone, Kent. Ratledge died on 5 February 2025 at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1943 births Category:2025 deaths Category:British rock musicians Category:British jazz musicians Category:British keyboardists Category:Musicians from Kent
title: Mike Ratledge
